channel.title: CTF on Mario S.O
channel.description: Recent content in CTF on Mario S.O

item.title: Day06 - VIP_Bank
item.description: Recently I discovered on Twitter this challenges page from Quill Audits, and I decided to give it a try. I started with the VIPBank challenge, which is a smart contract that allows you to deposit and withdraw funds from it. The challenge consists on locking the contract, aka DoS attack. The contract pragma solidity 0.8.7; contract VIP_Bank{ address public manager; mapping(address => uint) public balances; mapping(address => bool) public VIP; uint public maxETH = 0.
